activities.name: Eiffel Tower Visit
activities.description: Visit the iconic symbol of Paris and enjoy breathtaking views from its summit.

activities.name: Louvre Museum Tour
activities.description: Explore the world-famous art museum and admire masterpieces like the Mona Lisa.

activities.name: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Relax on a scenic cruise along the Seine River and see Paris from the water.

activities.name: Notre-Dame Cathedral Tour
activities.description: Visit the historic cathedral and marvel at its stunning Gothic architecture.
activities.location: 6 Parvis Notre-Dame - Pl. Jean-Paul II, Paris

activities.name: Montmartre Walking Tour
activities.description: Discover the bohemian charm of Montmartre, including the famous Sacré-Cœur Basilica.

activities.name: Palace of Versailles Tour
activities.description: Take a day trip to explore the opulent Palace of Versailles and its beautiful gardens.

activities.name: Opera Garnier Backstage Tour
activities.description: Go behind the scenes at the grand Opera Garnier and learn about its history.

activities.name: Luxembourg Gardens Stroll
activities.description: Enjoy a peaceful walk through the beautiful Luxembourg Gardens.

activities.name: Champs-Élysées Shopping
activities.description: Shop along the famous Champs-Élysées boulevard, lined with luxury boutiques and cafes.

activities.name: Musée d'Orsay Visit
activities.description: Admire an extensive collection of Impressionist masterpieces at the Musée d'Orsay.
activities.location: 1 Rue de la Légion d'Honneur, Paris
